title: A Differential Absorption Lidar for Measurement of Greenhouse Gases
abstractText:
Please see Summary entered by Edinburgh University the lead organization for: 

A Differential Absorption LIDAR for Measurement of Greenhouse Gases
impactText:
CEH has worked with Univ Edinburgh and STFC our project collaborators to discuss the continued development of the DIAL instrument and prepare for the field work that is planned under this grant. We organized a visit with our collaborators two field sites near CEH. We have also loaned some instruments to Edinburgh University.

The instrument for Green House Gas measurements is still being developed by Univ Edinburgh and STFC and we have not yet been able to test it out on the CEH field sites. So we have no outcomes from this research project to report.
organisation: NERC Centre for Ecology and Hydrology
findingsText: Our part of the project has not yet been completed we are wating for the instrument to be produced and delivered to our field sites for testing The project is not yet completed and no additional uses to those int eh origional grant have been identified. Environment
